Name: SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 Steam Edition
About the game: Record podcasts, digitize old recordings, edit and restore audio files, and create professional masters. Work on your projects quickly and easily with the perfect all-around audio editor – SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 Steam Edition! All the essential tools and functions are at your fingertips – thanks to the Instant Action window and Windows context menus. Work in 5.1 surround sound using 64-bit power on up to six channels and perfect your songs and recording with creative vintage effects for a high-quality sound experience. Highlights The essential features in SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 Steam Edition : Audio editing, recording, restoration & mastering New! Instant Action window for faster workflow New! Windows context menu for easy task assignment New!Oscilloscope for signal visualization Customizable user interface with four shade settings Digital conversion for vinyl and cassette Video sound optimization More flexible. More efficient. New features in version 14: Windows Context Menu Simply right-click to achieve the results you want even faster, such as converting an audio file directly within the Windows context menu. Instant Action The Instant Action window lets you access your favorite functions in a matter of seconds and saves you time when you're looking for a particular tool in the menu. Oscilloscope Visualize audio signals in waveform or display an effects chain's results in realtime.
